Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • Building
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Building>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Community, House, OtherBuilding, Store

    public abstract class Building
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Building>
    This is an abstract class that holds methods and fields common to all types of buildings
    Author:
    Adam Holt

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        Building - object to be compared
